00032 #include "util/Convert.h"
00033 #include "util/Fs.h"
00034 #include "util/FsTestDir.h"
00035 #include "util/RegressionTest.h"
00036 #include "util/Util.h"
00037 #include "util/Verbose.h"
00038 //
00039 #include <cstring>
00040 #include <string>
00041 #include <vector>
00042 //
00043 
00044 using namespace std;
00045 
00046 class SnpSummaryTest {
00047 
00048 public:
00049   int numPassed, numFailed;
00050   std::string testDir;
00051   SnpSummaryTest() {
00052     numPassed = 0;
00053     numFailed = 0;
00054   }
00055   void doCalvinChp();
00056   void doXdaChp();
00057   void doText();
00058 
00059 };
00060 
00061 void SnpSummaryTest::doCalvinChp() {
00062   string name = "qt-doCalvinChp";
00063   string command = "./apt-snp-summary -s " + testDir + "/qt-doCalvinChp/table.txt --chp-files=../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-summary/doBrlmmpSnp5Chp.chpfiles.txt";
00064   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00065 
00066   checks.push_back(new MixedFileCheck(testDir + "/qt-doCalvinChp/table.txt",
00067                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-summary/qt-doCalvinChp/table.txt", 
00068                                    0.0000001,
00069                                    0, 0));
00070 
00071   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00072   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00073   if(!test.pass()) {
00074     Verbose::out(1, "Error in SnpSummaryTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00075     numFailed++;
00076   }
00077   else {
00078     numPassed++;
00079   }
00080 }
00081

00105 
00106 void SnpSummaryTest::doText() {
00107   string name = "qt-doText";
00108   string command = "./apt-snp-summary -s " + testDir + "/qt-doText/table.txt --call-file=../../../regression-data/data/idata/p-geno/GenomeWideSNP_5/doBrlmmpSnp5Chp/brlmm-p.calls.txt";
00109   vector<RegressionCheck *> checks;
00110 
00111   checks.push_back(new MixedFileCheck(testDir + "/qt-doText/table.txt",
00112                                    "../../../regression-data/data/idata/snp-summary/qt-doText/table.txt", 
00113                                    0.0000001,
00114                                    0, 0));
00115 
00116   RegressionTest test(name.c_str(), command.c_str(), checks);
00117   Verbose::out(1, "Doing " + name + "()");
00118   if(!test.pass()) {
00119     Verbose::out(1, "Error in SnpSummaryTest::" + name + "(): " + test.getErrorMsg());
00120     numFailed++;
00121   }
00122   else {
00123     numPassed++;
00124   }
00125 }
00126 
00127 /** Everybody's favorite function. */
00128 int main(int argc, char* argv[]) {
00129   try {
00130     FsTestDir testDir;
00131     testDir.setTestDir("chipstream/snp-summary-qt", true);
00132     
00133     SnpSummaryTest test;
00134     test.testDir = testDir.asString();
00135     
00136     Verbose::setLevel(2);
00137 
00138     test.doXdaChp();
00139     test.doCalvinChp();
00140     test.doText();
00141 
00142     Verbose::out(1, "NumPassed: " + ToStr(test.numPassed) + " NumFailed: " + ToStr(test.numFailed));
00143     return test.numFailed != 0;
00144   }
00145   catch(...) {
00146       Verbose::out(1,"Unexpected Error: uncaught exception.");
00147       return 1;
00148   }
00149   return 1;
00150 }
